Return Data.interpretation_summary: Laboratory results show multiple abnormalities including anemia, elevated white blood cell count, kidney dysfunction, hyperglycemia, and hypercholesterolemia. Elevated creatinine indicates significant renal impairment requiring immediate attention.
clinical_significance: Moderate anemia suggesting chronic disease or blood loss
Leukocytosis indicating possible infection or inflammatory process
Stage 3 chronic kidney disease with significantly reduced GFR
Diabetes mellitus with poor glycemic control
High cardiovascular risk due to hypercholesterolemia
